$Rev: 792 $

ccc-gistemp Release Procedure

David Jones, Climate Code Foundation, 2010-11-30

INTRODUCTION

This is the documented procedure for making a release of ccc-gistemp

The intended readership is developers that need to make a release.

This document is not finished.


STEPS

issues
release notes
readme

svn export

tar gz
upload
download
test

HISTORY
